name: Drei Schnittbücher: 3 16th c Austrian Master Tailor Books
blurb: Never before published! Three rare 16th c tailoring manuscripts translated into English, with photos, diagrams, and descriptive text.

name: Emoji Dick
blurb: Translating Moby Dick into Japanese Emoji Icons using Amazon's Mechanical Turk.

blurb: International English edition of the first book in the world about The Alan Parsons Project, originally written in Italian language.

blurb: Creating Communication Cards for Syrian Families and all of those who would like to work with them. Sponsor families, healthcare, etc.

name: Travel Guide: Jane Austen's England
blurb: This travel guide takes you to the places where Jane Austen lived, worked and visited, and the (film) locations of her novels.

name: Bookselling Without Borders 2018
blurb: Bringing the World to American Readers

name: Third Editions: the Ultimate Anime Library
blurb: After successful campaigns dedicated to video games books, Third Éditions is back with the translation of  three new projects.

name: Four seasons in Japan - Autumn
blurb: A guide-novel through the Japanese Autumn

name: Primeros principios biblícos: aprende a contar
blurb: A Spanish-language edition of First Bible Basics: A Counting Primer

name: Budoji: A Tale of the Divine City of Ancient Korea
blurb: First English translation of the original text of ancient myths and wisdom, with commentary by Sungje Cho, scholar of Korean Shamanism
